plot: In April 1826 the siege by the Turks against the Greeks (Free Besieged) and the heroic exit from the "sacred city of Mesologgi." Depicts the heroism and sacrifice of the Greeks to the homeland and the freedom.
title: I exodos tou Mesolongiou
plot_es: In April 1826 the siege by the Turks against the Greeks (Free Besieged) and the heroic exit from the "sacred city of Mesologgi." Depicts the heroism and sacrifice of the Greeks to the homeland and the freedom.
plot_en: In April 1826 the siege by the Turks against the Greeks (Free Besieged) and the heroic exit from the "sacred city of Mesologgi." Depicts the heroism and sacrifice of the Greeks to the homeland and the freedom.
